name: Reverse Engineer
description:
In Reverse Engineer you play an Engineer lost in a spaceship equipped with a gun that rewinds objects. Can you find your way out?

The game features over 40 levels and a variety of different mechanics such as reflectors, enemies, and falling platforms and much more. You can even create your own levels (see the attached video).

This game was created in 7 Days for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2

Controls
  • W/Up Arrow/Space - Jump
  • A/Left Arrow - Left
  • S/Down Arrow - Down
  • D/Right Arrow - Right
  • Left Click - Shoot
  • Right Click/Q - Overlay
  • E/Middle Mouse Button - Recall Orb
  • R/F5 - Reset Level
  • Esc - Open/Close Menu
Credits Game Design
